timeline.bodyText: Is it necessary to write dmn result to console? I would suggest to remove this debugging output.
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

replies.bodyText: well spotted, sorry this slipped through, thanks
replies.author: tarilabs

timeline.bodyText: Is this method part of some public API? Do we need to keep it as deprecated? Can't we delete it completely?
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

replies.bodyText:
Is this method part of some public API?

No

Do we need to keep it as deprecated?

I am introducing with this PR that is deprecated as I realized this constructor is not convenient as I did this specific task

Can't we delete it completely?

It will be part of another task, for this PR I am realizing this constructor is just plain painful as it's not consistent with the other constructors.
replies.author: tarilabs
